subject: p15393401
History: Evaluation of the patient with end-stage renal disease and hypertension.
Findings: Portable AP radiograph of the chest was reviewed in comparison to. Cardiomegaly is substantial, unchanged since the prior study, but there is interval improvement in interstitial pulmonary edema. Still present right basal opacity might reflect the residua as well as a combination of pleural effusion with atelectasis. No pneumothorax is seen.
